name: admin.conversations.restrictAccess.addGroup
desc: Add an allowlist of IDP groups for accessing a channel

channel_id.desc: The channel to link this group to.

group_id.desc: The [IDP Group](https://slack.com/help/articles/115001435788-Connect-identity-provider-groups-to-your-Enterprise-organization) ID to be an allowlist for the private channel.

team_id.desc: The workspace where the channel exists. This argument is required for channels only tied to one workspace, and optional for channels that are shared across an organization.

errors.cannot_add_more_channels_to_group: The maximum number of channels have already been linked to the group.
errors.cannot_add_more_groups_to_channel: The maximum number of groups have already been linked to the channel.
errors.channel_is_not_private: The channel is a public channel, a multi-party direct message, a direct message, or is externally-shared.
errors.default_channel_restricted: The channel is a default channel on the workspace.
errors.group_already_linked_to_channel: The IDP group is already linked to the channel
errors.group_must_not_be_empty: The IDP group is currently empty.
errors.invalid_auth: Token does not belong to enterprise or team id passed in not part of this enterprise
errors.invalid_channel: The channel can’t be linked to an IDP group (i.e., it's a public channel or external shared channel).
errors.invalid_channel_type: The channel is a public channel, a multi-party direct message, a direct message, or is externally-shared.
errors.not_an_admin: This token does not belong to an Org Admin or Owner.
errors.unable_to_link_idp_group_and_channel: The IDP group and the channel cannot be linked.
